column4: i am getting  elf class32 error when  i am giving the cmd sudo apt-get install --reinstall libstdc++6
jussi,i am getting elf class32 error when i am giving the cmd sudo apt-get install --reinstall libstdc++6
had you modified the apt repository list beforehand?
no not able to goto synaptic manager also
you've got the package. you could pull the library out of that, and move it into place manually.
it's probably still in /var/cache/apt/archives. have a look there.
